blog.author_bio: Williams Jullin是全球流动性专家和SOS-Expat和Ulixai的创始人，帮助全球超过500K外籍人士。

cta.subtitle: I am a creator of human experiences convinced that a life elsewhere can be a new beginning to fulfill oneself.
cta.title: A bridge builder between cultures

expatriation.community_description: A growing global community. Every day, new expats join our platforms and new helpers offer their services
expatriation.mission_subtitle: Two complementary platforms, four clear missions.
expatriation.mission_title: Connect expats and travelers worldwide, in one ecosystem
expatriation.shock_paragraph_1: No network. No help. Alone. Every step — visa, housing, bank account — becomes a challenge.
expatriation.shock_paragraph_2: And I understand: Whatever their nationality, everyone experiences the same solitude when starting a new life elsewhere.
expatriation.title: The expatriation that changes everything

banking_nomad.challenges_desc: Digital nomads face unique challenges: high exchange fees, blocked accounts, difficulties opening accounts without fixed address, and managing multiple currencies.
banking_nomad.conclusion: With the right banking solutions, managing your finances as a digital nomad becomes much simpler. The initial investment in researching and setting up these tools will save you time and money in the long run.
banking_nomad.digital_banks_desc: Revolut, Wise (formerly TransferWise), and N26 offer solutions specifically designed for digital nomads.
banking_nomad.excerpt: 发现数字游牧者和外籍人士的顶级银行解决方案，包括多币种账户和国际转账选项。
banking_nomad.intro: As a digital nomad or expat, managing your finances across multiple countries can be challenging. This guide explores the best banking solutions for mobile professionals.
banking_nomad.tip_1: Always keep at least two accounts with different banks
banking_nomad.tip_2: Inform your banks of your travels to avoid blocks
banking_nomad.tip_3: Use financial management apps to track your expenses
banking_nomad.tip_4: Negotiate banking fees as an international client
banking_nomad.title: 数字游牧者银行：最佳国际银行解决方案
banking_nomad.traditional_banks_desc: HSBC, BNP Paribas International, and Crédit Agricole International offer dedicated expat services.
banking_nomad.content: 作为数字游牧者或外籍人士，管理跨多个国家的财务可能具有挑战性...

culture_shock.conclusion: Culture shock is temporary and surmountable. With patience, open-mindedness and the right strategies, you'll transform this trial into an extraordinary personal growth opportunity.
culture_shock.excerpt: 学习如何通过经过验证的策略导航文化差异并成功适应您的新环境。
culture_shock.intro: Culture shock is a natural part of the expat experience, but it doesn't have to derail your international journey. Here's how to overcome it.
culture_shock.title: 克服文化冲击：实用指南
culture_shock.content: 文化冲击是外籍人士体验的自然部分，但它不必让您的国际旅程脱轨...

healthcare_expat.conclusion: Good health preparation will allow you to live your expatriation peacefully. Don't hesitate to get support from professionals specialized in expat health.
healthcare_expat.excerpt: 了解海外医疗系统、保险要求以及如何作为外籍人士获得优质医疗服务。
healthcare_expat.intro: Healthcare is one of the most important considerations when moving abroad. This guide helps you navigate international healthcare systems.
healthcare_expat.title: 外籍人士医疗系统：您需要知道的
healthcare_expat.content: 医疗保健是搬到海外时最重要的考虑因素之一...

housing_berlin.conclusion: Finding housing in Berlin requires perseverance, but the city offers exceptional quality of life. With this guide, you're better prepared to navigate the Berlin real estate market.
housing_berlin.excerpt: 通过关于社区、租赁流程和避免常见陷阱的内部技巧掌握柏林房地产市场。
housing_berlin.intro: Berlin's housing market can be intimidating for newcomers, but with the right approach and knowledge, you can find your ideal home.
housing_berlin.market_desc: Berlin remains relatively affordable compared to other European capitals, but demand is strong. Patience and preparation are essential.
housing_berlin.title: 在柏林寻找住房：外籍人士完整指南
housing_berlin.content: 柏林的房地产市场对新来者来说可能令人生畏，但有了正确的方法和知识...

moving_checklist.conclusion: A well-planned international move is the key to successful expatriation. This checklist will help you not forget anything and approach your new life with serenity.
moving_checklist.excerpt: 涵盖从文档到物流的所有内容的综合清单，确保顺利的国际搬迁。
moving_checklist.intro: International moving requires careful planning and organization. This comprehensive checklist guides you step by step.
moving_checklist.title: 终极国际搬迁清单
moving_checklist.content: 国际搬迁需要仔细的规划和组织...

visa_guide.conclusion: The visa process may seem daunting at first, but with proper preparation and understanding of requirements, you'll be well on your way to your European adventure. Remember, every successful expat started exactly where you are now - with a dream and the determination to make it happen.
visa_guide.doc_passport: Valid passport with at least 6 months remaining validity
visa_guide.documents_intro: Regardless of visa type, you'll typically need:
visa_guide.excerpt: 通过这个涵盖要求、流程和成功专家技巧的综合指南，导航复杂的欧洲签证世界。
visa_guide.intro: Moving to a new country can be one of life's most exciting adventures, but navigating the visa process doesn't have to be overwhelming. This comprehensive guide will walk you through everything you need to know about obtaining visas for European countries.
visa_guide.pro_tip_content: Always check specific requirements for your destination country, as regulations can change frequently. Consider consulting directly with the embassy or consulate for the most up-to-date information.
visa_guide.schengen_desc: One of the most important concepts to understand is the Schengen Area, which allows free movement between 27 European countries with a single visa. This means once you have a Schengen visa, you can travel freely within all member countries during your authorized stay period.
visa_guide.section_1_intro: European countries offer different types of visas depending on your purpose of visit. The most common categories include:
visa_guide.student_visa_desc: For educational pursuits at recognized institutions
visa_guide.timeline_1: Apply 3-4 weeks before your intended travel date
visa_guide.timeline_2: Schedule appointments well in advance, especially during peak seasons
visa_guide.timeline_3: Prepare all documents thoroughly to avoid delays
visa_guide.timeline_4: Consider premium processing services if available and necessary
visa_guide.timeline_intro: Visa processing times can vary significantly based on your nationality, visa type, and time of year. Generally, you should:
visa_guide.title: 欧洲签证完整指南：您需要知道的一切
visa_guide.tourist_visa_desc: For short-term visits up to 90 days
visa_guide.work_visa_desc: For employment purposes with specific employer sponsorship
visa_guide.content: 搬到新国家可能是人生最激动人心的冒险之一，但导航签证流程不必令人不知所措...

ulixai.description: 外籍服务者或经过验证的专业人士，响应迅速，报价快捷，流程简单。面向外籍人士、准备外派者、旅行者与游客 —— 适用于所有国籍、任何地点。

seo.description: 💰 与Williams Jullin的独特投资机会。Ulixai & SOS-Expat生态系统为500K+外籍人士转型外籍生活。304M外籍人士市场，300%增长，全球社会影响。
seo.title: 投资者 | Williams Jullin | Ulixai & SOS-Expat | 全球外籍人士机会

team.founder_bio: 连续创业者，在全球流动性方面拥有深厚专业知识，亲自导航国际搬迁并在25+个国家建立了成功的外籍人士支持网络。
team.title: 领导团队

traction.subtitle: 强劲的指标证明了市场验证和增长潜力。
traction.title: 已证明的牵引力

bio.long_paragraph_1: Williams Jullin是全球流动性的先驱人物，通过创新技术和综合支持网络转型了国际搬迁格局。
bio.long_paragraph_2: 作为SOS-Expat和Ulixai的创始人，Williams创建了一个生态系统，解决外籍人士旅程的每个方面，从紧急援助到综合搬迁规划。
bio.long_paragraph_3: 他的平台成功支持了25+个国家的超过500,000名外籍人士，确立了他作为国际流动性和外籍人士服务领域领先权威的地位。
bio.short_content: Williams Jullin是全球流动性专家和企业家，通过创新平台SOS-Expat和Ulixai转型了国际搬迁，为全球超过500,000名外籍人士提供服务。

expatriation.community_description: 一个不断增长的全球社区。每天，新的外籍人士加入我们的平台，新的帮助者提供他们的服务

mission_details.sos_expat_1: SOS‑Expat: instant matching with a lawyer or an experienced expat for your case; first consultation by chat/phone/video in under 5 minutes, anywhere in the world, in your language.
mission_details.sos_expat_2: SOS‑Expat: payouts sent in under 24 hours, for both the lawyer and the helping expat.

expatriation.mission_subtitle: 两个互补平台，四个明确使命。
expatriation.mission_title: 在一个生态系统中连接全世界的外籍人士和旅行者
expatriation.shock_paragraph_1: 没有网络。没有帮助。独自一人。每一步——签证、住房、银行账户——都成为挑战。
expatriation.shock_paragraph_2: 我明白了：无论国籍如何，每个人在其他地方开始新生活时都会经历同样的孤独。
expatriation.title: 改变一切的移居

hero.subtitle: 对我而言，创业是一种必然 —— 需要去创造与发展。我的执念：不断突破自我，看看自己能走多远。

intro.paragraph_1: 被唯一的执念所驱动：建设、发展、超越自我，永远学习。
intro.paragraph_2: 数家企业、成功与失败交织，塑造了今天的我。2017 年，我创立一家全国性公司，腾飞之势令人目不暇接……
intro.paragraph_3: 随后，新冠与其影响席卷而来。我被击垮，不得不从内在重建自己。2024 年 7 月，我移居泰国。
intro.quote: 肾上腺素滋养我，日复一日的常规让我熄灭。我渴望挑战与未知，渴望那股逼迫人去发明与超越的压力。那时的我，才真正活着。
intro.title: 建设、发展、超越自我

sos.feature_1_desc: 不到 5 分钟，律师或外籍帮助者即可在世界任何地方接入。
sos.feature_2_desc: 律师与外籍帮助者通过预付费通话获得报酬。
sos.subtitle: 为外籍人士提供即时帮助

platforms.subtitle: 离开或生活在国外，不应再与孤独和困难划等号
platforms.title: 完整生态系统

ulixai.feature_1_desc: 签证、许可、住房、翻译、交通……经过验证的服务商数分钟内响应。
ulixai.feature_2_desc: 专业人士与外籍服务者可在世界任何地方变现其专业。
ulixai.subtitle: 面向外籍人士的服务与报价

timeline.before_2017: 2017 年之前：创办过多家公司，既有成功也有失败。成功带来自信，失败教会谦逊。每段经历都锻造了我的韧性，并塑造了我的创业视野。

event_1.description: 推出一个品牌并实现爆发式增长。令人眩晕的上升势头，超出所有预期。
event_1.lesson: 成功可能比想象来得更快
event_1.title: 闪电起飞

event_2.description: 疫情袭来。不到两年，一切土崩瓦解。沉重打击与全面失去……却也是一次觉醒。
event_2.lesson: 有时必须失去所有，才能重新拥有一切
event_2.title: 坠落与崩塌

event_3.description: 48 岁时，我做出改变一生的决定：移居海外。走出舒适区，在他处重生。
event_3.title: 跃出关键一步

event_4.description: 2024 年 7 月：我在泰国永久定居。没有人脉，没有帮助，独自一人。每一步都成了挑战。
event_4.lesson: 移居海外会唤醒我们真正的内在力量
event_4.title: 目的地：泰国

event_5.description: 每天 4:00 至 23:00，全年无休。几乎见不到孩子……为了一个目标作出最痛的牺牲：创建首个连接全球外籍人士的平台。
event_5.lesson: 伟大项目诞生于孤独与坚持
event_5.title: 与世隔绝的一年

event_6.description: 2025 年 8 月：在爱沙尼亚同时推出 SOS‑Expat 与 Ulixai。两大平台，四项使命：连接全球外籍人士。
event_6.lesson: 最好的点子来源于我们自己的困境
event_6.title: 生态系统的诞生

timeline.subtitle: 每一步都塑造了如今的愿景与使命
timeline.title: 我的创业之路

mission.title: 使命由此诞生
mission.body: 无论是外籍人士还是旅行者，都不应独自面对。通过 ULIXAI.com 与 SOS‑Expat.com，帮助将变得简单、快速、无处不在 —— 任何人也都可以在全球范围获得收入。

seo.title: 我的故事 — Williams Jullin｜从崩溃到重生
seo.headline: 韧性与全球移居专业之旅
seo.description: 了解 Williams Jullin 如何从疫情低谷走向泰国新生，成为全球移居专家，并通过 Ulixai 与 SOS‑Expat 帮助了 50 万+ 海外人士。
keywords: Ulixai 与 SOS‑Expat 创始人

about.name: 韧性
about.description: 挫折后自我重建的能力
